info.title: Catalyst Explorer API
info.description: Cardano Project Catalyst Explorer openapi served by LIDO Nation

get.description: Returns a list of all challenges

parameters.name: fund_id
parameters.description: Filter content by id of a fund

parameters.name: person_id
parameters.description: id of the person to return

get.description: Returns a list of all tags
Use this endpoint to retrieve a single tag

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: title of the tag to retrieve

get.description: Returns all proposals with filtering abilities

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of content to be returned per page url ranging from 1 to 60

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to be returned from content pages which is relative to the number of content to be returned and per_page setting as per the request

message.example: Detailed message of errors, when available
Detailed message of errors, when available

problem.example: How can we enable the creation of micro-lending and Defi dApp solutions that fit the African setting?

solution.example: Extend existing NGO community student hub to add a Cardano Blockchain Lab with dedicated computers, developer mentorship, & community ed.

experience.example: 14+ Yrs Software & Cloud Engring, Blockchain development, business consulting, world languages, technical writing, teaching, mentored 3 ft .

content.example: Alias rem dolorum dolores impedit hic. Et molestiae quae amet aut possimus. Ex aperiam quisquam suscipit sunt.Vitae eligendi temporibus quia delectus deserunt. Eum eveniet accusantium rerum ut consequatur.
